name: Men Solid Round Neck Pure Cotton T-Shirt
description: A comfortable, high-quality round neck t-shirt made from pure cotton. Perfect for casual wear.

name: Men Solid Round Neck Polyester Beige T-Shirt
description: A stylish and comfortable polyester beige t-shirt with a round neck design, ideal for casual outings.

name: Printed Bollywood Georgette, Silk Blend Saree
description: A beautiful pink printed Bollywood-style saree made from a blend of georgette and silk, perfect for festive occasions and traditional events.

name: Einstein Box Science Experiment Kit
description: A comprehensive science kit with 120 experiments for children aged 8 and above. Perfect for hands-on learning and fostering an interest in chemistry and science.

name: NIVIA Shining Star Football - Size 5
description: A high-quality football designed for durability and performance. Perfect for practice and competitive play, made for football enthusiasts.

name: Xbox Series S Console SSD 512 GB
description: The Xbox Series S is a sleek and compact gaming console with a 512 GB SSD for fast performance and seamless gaming. Enjoy next-gen gaming experiences with stunning graphics and speed.

name: SONY PlayStation5 Digital Edition (Slim)
description: The SONY PlayStation5 Digital Edition (Slim) offers an immersive gaming experience with high-speed performance and stunning graphics. Ideal for digital game enthusiasts.

name: Apple iPhone 16 Pro (Desert Titanium, 256 GB)
description: Experience cutting-edge technology with the Apple iPhone 16 Pro. Featuring a 16.0 cm (6.3 inch) Super Retina XDR display, a powerful A18 Pro chip with 6-core processor, and a triple rear camera setup (48MP + 48MP + 12MP) along with a 12MP front camera. Enjoy 256 GB ROM for ample storage and a sleek Desert Titanium finish.

name: Caprese Women Beige Handbag
description: A stylish and elegant beige handbag from Caprese, perfect for everyday use. Crafted with high-quality materials, offering ample space and a comfortable strap for easy carrying.
